plot: An old woman welcomes the police officer at her door. In a long monologue, she tells him how the rusty nail got into her husband's skull a long time ago.
title: Nagel zum Sarg
plot_es: An old woman welcomes the police officer at her door. In a long monologue, she tells him how the rusty nail got into her husband's skull a long time ago.
plot_en: An old woman welcomes the police officer at her door. In a long monologue, she tells him how the rusty nail got into her husband's skull a long time ago.
